text: Firebuds is an American animated children's comedy television series created by Craig Gerber. It is produced by Electric Emu Productions and Disney Television Animation. It premiered on Disney Jr. on September 21, 2022. In a world where human and talking cars co-exist, a group of kids and their rescue vehicle buddies go through the communities of Gearbox Grove and Motopolis and help keep them safe from danger. title: Firebuds
